PLT_CtrlPointGetSCPDRequest Class Reference

The PLT_CtrlPointGetSCPDRequest class is used by a PLT_CtrlPointGetSCPDTask task to fetch a specific SCPD xml document for a given service of a given device. More...

#include <PltCtrlPointTask.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The PLT_CtrlPointGetSCPDRequest class is used by a PLT_CtrlPointGetSCPDTask task to fetch a specific SCPD xml document for a given service of a given device.

The documentation for this class was generated from the following file:
